summary: The diff only modifies `project_state.json` and does not show any replacement of the logo image at `frontend/public/assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png` or any asset updates related to REQ-15.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the currently used NK SYSTECH logo image with the newly uploaded logo (nk.png) while keeping the existing logo asset path used by the UI: /assets/generated/nk-systech-logo.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to the required logo file path under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, and the diff contains only a metadata/state file change (`project_state.json`).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified project metadata/state (`project_state.json`) unrelated to replacing the logo asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to replace the logo image file while keeping the same asset path and explicitly avoids other changes; modifying `project_state.json` is not requested or necessary for the logo swap.
